Class AbstractConnectionFactory<T>

java.lang.Object
  org.fax4j.util.AbstractConnectionFactory<T>
Type Parameters:
T - The resource type
All Implemented Interfaces:
ProviderImplementation, ConnectionFactory<T>
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbstractFax4JConnectionFactory
public abstract class AbstractConnectionFactory<T>
extends Object
implements ConnectionFactory<T>

This class provides the basic common connection factory capabilities.
